Jefferson de França Filho - Bachelor of Software Engineering - Federal Technological University of Paraná - UTFPR -Project manager and developer.
Fabrício Martins Lopes - PhD in Bioinformatics (2011) from the University of São Paulo - Professor at the Federal Technological University of Paraná - UTFPR - Project Advisor.
João Gabriel Salgado - Bachelor in Software Engineering - Federal Technological University of Paraná - UTFPR - Volunteer.
Jose Ede Campos Neto - Bachelor in Software Engineering - Federal Technological University of Paraná - UTFPR - Volunteer.

Its objective is to select candidates for scholarship grants, supported by UTFPR resources, through the submission of a project related to the quality of students academic life, focusing on admission, permanence and insertion in society. \n\nThe project Aids for the Treatment of Persons with Stuttering was submitted and submitted to EDITAL 013/2017 STUDENT PROTAGONISM for the Cornélio Procópio campus, approved in the second half of 2017
You can set the delay and frequency according to your preferences!
You can add a mode by saving the delay and frequency preferences that you set in the above seekbar's!
For more information, go to the About tab.
For correct playback of audio, use a headset!
To start playback correctly, select the delay and frequency options above! Or one mode!
To apply the new DELAY preferences, restart playback!
